plot outline: Aa Ondu Dina is based on the story of two political candidates, supporters and the party workers who get involved in an altercation with to get votes from the common man. It showcases how the common man gets lured by the politicians' pseudo agenda during the election period. The film is the director, Sanjay's attempt to create an awareness about the importance of casting their vote.
title: Aa Ondu Dina
plot: The fight for seats during election among the candidates and to what extent they go to gain support from the common man.

_Aa Ondu Dina_ (qv) is based on the story of two political candidates, supporters and the party workers who get involved in an altercation with to get votes from the common man. It showcases how the common man gets lured by the politicians' pseudo agenda during the election period. The film is the director, Sanjay's attempt to create an awareness about the importance of casting their vote.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
